cta.heading: Ready to transform your daycare management?

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Procreche.

items.question: Is the application easy for my team to use?
items.answer: Absolutely. Procreche was co-designed with early childhood professionals. The interface is intuitive, and a 30-minute training session is all it takes to get fully up and running. Our clients are often surprised by how quickly their teams adopt it.

items.question: Is the children's data security guaranteed?
items.answer: It is our absolute priority. We use bank-level encryption and our servers are hosted in secure, compliant data centers. You remain the sole owner of your data, in accordance with GDPR.

items.question: Do I have to commit for a long period?
items.answer: No, our subscriptions are flexible with no long-term commitment. You can start with our 14-day free trial, no credit card required, and see for yourself the value we provide.

hero.heading: Daycare management, finally simplified.
hero.subheading: Free yourself from administrative tasks. Rediscover the joy of focusing on what matters most: the children.

testimonials.title: What Our Partner Daycares Say About Us
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from directors and teams who have transformed their daily work with Procreche.

items.name: Sophie Martin
items.message: Since we started using {siteName}, communication with parents has never been smoother. They feel reassured and involved. The tool has freed us from an incredible mental load.

items.name: Karim Dubois
items.message: Billing was my monthly nightmare. With {siteName}, it's done in 15 minutes. It's simple, reliable, and the support is incredibly responsive. I could never go back.

items.name: Aline Bernard
items.message: I was afraid digital tools would take over the human element, but it's the complete opposite. I spend less time on paperwork and more time playing and interacting with the children. It's a real joy.
